rlang part of the tidyverse
  • Reference
  • News

The rlang package provides tools to work with expressions and calls in R. It is a fork of lazyeval that is larger in scope than just non-standard evaluation.

Installation

Install the development version from github with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hadley/rlang", build_vignettes = TRUE)

License

GPL-3

    Author, maintainer

  • All authors...

Dev status

rlang is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.

Developed by Hadley Wickham, Lionel Henry.
